alter.title: Friendly reminder:
alter.content:
1. To use object storage, you need to transfer the resource files under the storage directory to the object storage space with the original directory path. Check the migration document for details. 
2. Do not switch the storage method at will, it may lead to images and other resources can not be viewed. 
3. Domain cross-domain needs to be set in the object store background, otherwise the resource may not be viewable after uploading to OSS.

storageType.label: Storage method
storageType.desc: After switching to Alibaba Cloud OSS, the asset library needs to be re-uploaded to Alibaba Cloud OSS.

spaceDomain.label: Spatial Domain
spaceDomain.desc: Please complete with http:// or https://, for example https://static.cloud.com

location.kodo: Stored on Qiniu Cloud, please go to Qiniu Cloud to activate the storage service.
location.oss: Stored on Alibaba Cloud, please go to Alibaba Cloud to activate the storage service.
location.cos: Stored on Tencent Cloud, please go to Tencent Cloud to enable the storage service

aliCloud.paramDesc: Alibaba Cloud Direct File Upload Parameters
